name: Tohru - Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid
description:
What does it do you ask? Tohru, the best waifu from Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid, was something I really wanted to make as she is the best. So, I made it. I couldn't get myself to use too many of NSFW Locon's in the preview images because I just like her too much as a character lol. Do whatever you want with her of course though.

How to use it: First we have the core trigger baked into the Locon.

TohruDM - Main trigger word.

Also, add either:

WTail or NTail - Depending on if you want to emphasize her tail's existence or not. Note: I am not held responsible for SD trying to put tails in the weirdest spots at times ;9.

Recommended as well:
white pantyhose - The training data tried it's best to add her pantyhose but doesn't always succeed. I'd add this to remind it (and me) of our failings.

Extra, Extra!: Should be well trained and usable in most models. Images shown for example.

Picture Descriptions:

1-2: AnythingV3 using just this Lora with simpler prompts... And one sad Tohru :(.

3: AnythingV3 with just this Lora and a business suit prompt.

4: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Anime Officer-ify Locon.

5: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Knight-ify Locon.

6: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress style of Defaultz_17 Locon.

7: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Brainwashing Machine Locon.

8: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress PhonePic Locon.

9: AbyssOrange with just this Lora.

10: RevAnimated using just this Lora.

11: PerfectWorld with just this Lora.

How was it trained?

It was trained on animefull_final with 29 images with the usual self-pruning and tagging and a wide range of different images. I like keeping my prompts simple for the first few pictures so that you can see it without a whole bunch of mumbo jumbo. Make your pictures better than mine though!

What's next for this?

Should be good to go with this one but let me know of errors.

What's next that isn't this?

More character Loras. (Viper and Rupee from Nikke, Spectre Tenebria from E7, Zephia and Yunaka from Fire Emblem Engage, Ivy from Soul Calibur 5, Heine from Combatants Will Be Dispatched, Conqueror Lilias from E7, Evelynn from LoL (both base and All Out version), Tharja from Fire Emblem, Laharl-Chan from Disgaea 5, Miku from Idaten Deities, Kuribayashi Shino from GATE, Rin Sohma from Fruits Basket, Kasumi from P5, Ann from P5, Ikumi Mito from Food Wars, Alice Nakiri from Food Wars, Chika Fujiwara from Kaguya-sama, Lulu from FF10, Momo from My Hero, Sheik from Zelda, Vivy from Vivy, Lucoa from Dragon Maid, Laharl-chan from Disgaea, Dominique de Sade from Vanitas, and Dos from One Punch Man.) And maybe Wilhelm van Astrea, my favorite Re:Zero husbando or a Prinny from Disgaea.

V2's of some of the previous Loras. Specifically make them more diversely acceptable with other models and LORA's.

I also have some more quite NSFW Locon's. I decided to list them as well, so if people have preferences on which to fix up first let me know. Specifically, Beta Censorship (Automatically censors any images you create to make them BetaSafe), PhonePic (Thisone has been very, very hard... But TLDR, someone holding a nuder version of the waifu on the phone), Demonic Transformation, being stepped on, Robotification, Defeated (decently NSFW defeat scenario for the waifu getting abused), Petrified (I'm unsure if I should bother with this one anymore), Infection (this one is VERY nsfw, as the waifu is completely infected), Dominatrix (waifu becoming a dominatrix), Brainwashing Machine, Tentacles, Pillory, Masked Evil (A mask that possess' the waifu), Latex Corruption, Combat Drone (hard to describe but basically making them a mindless sci-fi combat warrior), JAV Supervillain, Jiangshi (Transforms into a Jiangshi), Mind Flayer Defeat, Blacked, Hypnotized Harem, Hourglass Figure (just to make your waifu curvy), and Holding a Leash.

And, uh, I want to make a few "normal" Locon's so I have an "knight-ify" your character one coming up. And a forest fairy one as well. And a officer one. And a barbarian one.

Additionally, I love the style of Defaultz_17, so I'm making a Locon to mirror that.

Or just give me some random suggestion or priority opinions. That works too.\

I've also added a couple of my extreme NSFW preview images to my twitter (https://twitter.com/TwoMoreTimes89). Let me know if you think I should work on them more for a submission here.

<lora:Defaultz17-20:0.9>, DefaultzA, finger to mouth, <lora:TohruDM-14:0.8>, TohruDM, WTail, 1girl
<lora:BrnWshM:1>, BrnWshM, head-mounted display, glowing, bondage, restrained, mind control, <lora:TohruDM-14:1>, TohruDM, 1girl
<lora:TohruDM-14:1>, TohruDM, WTail, volumetric lighting, best quality, masterpiece, intricate details, tonemapping, sharp focus, hyper detailed, absurdres, highres, 1girl
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), (inaccurate limb:1.2), bad composition, inaccurate eyes, extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2)

meta.prompt: <lora:TohruDM-14:1>, TohruDM, WTail, Ultra-detail, (highres:1.1), best quality, (masterpiece:1.3), cinematic lighting
